Name: 故鄉戰爭 HOMETOWN WAR
About the game: HOMETOWN WAR History The Battle for Sihang Warehouse took place from October 26 to November 1, 1937 The Battle for Sihang Warehouse held out against numerous waves of Imperial Japanese Army and covered National Revolutionary Army retreating west during the Battle of Shanghai. HOMETOWN WAR Multiplayer FPS Game This include 5 Game Modes: Team Deathmatch Team Deathmatch Stage Deathmatch Conquest Rush SinglePlayer mode : Players and our AI fight against enemy AI Multiplayer mode : Support to 8 players The LOBBY ( Listen Server ) Weapon Guns : WWII weapons that existed before 1937 Map : Battle of Shanghai ( The Battle zone of Bazi Bridge ) ( V0.2.01 ) The Battle for Sihang Warehouse Battle Zone ( simulation )
